description: This assessment identifies personality preferences based on Carl Jung's theory, as operationalized by Myers and Briggs.
instructions: For each pair of statements, choose the one that sounds more like you.

dimensions.name: Judging (J) - Perceiving (P)
dimensions.description: How you deal with the outside world.

statements.A: I prefer to be out and about, meeting new people and experiencing new things.
statements.B: I prefer quiet, solitary activities and spending time with a few close friends or family.

statements.A: I focus on facts, details, and the present moment.
statements.B: I focus on possibilities, patterns, and the future.

statements.A: I make decisions based on logic, principles, and objective analysis.
statements.B: I make decisions based on personal values, harmony, and how it affects others.

statements.A: I like to have a plan, make decisions quickly, and stick to a schedule.
statements.B: I like to stay flexible, keep my options open, and adapt to new information.
